scenes.action_text: ARTHUR Written by Peter Baynham 10/16/09 EXT. MANHATTAN - NIGHT A HOMELESS MAN, who from his tatty suit may have been a top broker this time last year, is picking through a bin in Manhattan's deserted night-time financial district. The street starts to vibrate. A TERRIFYING GROWL approaches. A huge black shape smashes into view - THE DARK KNIGHT'S BATMOBILE! Our audi
